content:
Yes, takoyaki is definitely worth trying! And the best places to enjoy them in an authentic setting are at outdoor street vendors and food markets in Osaka. Here are some suggested locations where you can sample delicious takoyaki:

1. Dotonbori - this bustling street in Osaka's Minami district is famous for its street food vendors and is often referred to as "the kitchen of Osaka". You'll find plenty of takoyaki shops here, including famous ones such as Kukuru and Creo-ru. 2. Kuromon Market - also known as Osaka's Kitchen, Kuromon Market is a popular food market located in Namba that offers a wide variety of fresh seafood, produce, and street food. You'll find multiple takoyaki vendors here, including famous ones such as Marukatsu and Daruma. 3. Tsutenkaku Tower Street - located in Shinsekai, this street is home to numerous food stalls and iconic landmarks such as the Tsutenkaku Tower. Popular takoyaki stalls here include Tamaya and Aizuya. 4. Yatai-mura Food Village - located in Osaka's Tennoji district, this food village offers an array of street food options in a lively and festive setting. You'll find several takoyaki stalls here, including well-known vendors such as Wanaka and Doutonbori Bonanza. These are just a few of the many locations where you can try authentic takoyaki in Osaka. Have fun exploring the vibrant street food scene in the city!
